Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI provides thorough and deep information or feedback, but teachers sometimes do not provide any feedback or their information and knowledge is very vague.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI provides thorough feedback allowing me to improve but teachers sometimes do not provide any or very vague feedback which doesn't help in improving my work.
